nodes.text: The Blackhawk Destroyer was a sleek, personal spacecraft.
The craft could fit at least three people and was meant only for short excursions into space, having no hyperdrive.

Prince Coby of Tammuz-an bought a Blackhawk Destroyer on Chuzalla in an attempt at retrieving his pet Ingey from the Starhunter's Intergalactic Menagerie. After running out of fuel, he used the ship to latch onto the Starhunters' menagerie ark and travel through hyperspace. Coby crashed the vessel on the jungle world of Dandelo.
